Axel Napolitano

Experimental Old School Intro with Sid Music

A javascript based font and scroller together with some CSS3 animated color bars and a swinging logo.

The soundtrack of this intro is "Present" from "Cubehead" - a Sid Tune from the famous HVSID-Collection.

Sid Playback was provided by TinyJSid-Library, a completely javascript based Sid-Player written by Juergen Wothke

Experiment
